bug.author: AjitDingankar
bug.summary: Can't build 3.1.1 binaries on CentOS7 due to boost version mismatch
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue description</denchmark-h>
Trying build 3.1.1 from sources fails with a ton of messages re boost such as: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2213240/62391345-608a5880-b519-11e9-9908-86da5eac4867.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h4>Your environment</denchmark-h>
version of mlpack: 3.1.1 operating system: CentOS 7.6.1810 compiler: gcc 4.8.5 version of dependencies (Boost/Armadillo): Boost 1.70.0 Armadillo 8.300.0 any other environment information you think is relevant: BOOST_ROOT /opt/boost
<denchmark-h:h4>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Download 3.1.1 sources Create build subdirectory and run cmake/make there
<denchmark-h:h4>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Cmake should find pthread_create Boost version found should be 1.70 (not 1.49) The bin subdirectory should have all the executables such as mlpack_preprocess_split
<denchmark-h:h4>Actual behavior</denchmark-h>
Cmake configure stage shows:
-- Looking for pthread_create - not found
Boost version is inconsistent:
-- Found Boost 1.70.0 at /opt/boost/lib/cmake/Boost-1.70.0 -- Requested configuration: QUIET REQUIRED COMPONENTS program_options;unit_test_framework;serialization -- Found boost_headers 1.70.0 at /opt/boost/lib/cmake/boost_headers-1.70.0 -- Found boost_program_options 1.70.0 at /opt/boost/lib/cmake/boost_program_options-1.70.0 -- libboost_program_options.so.1.70.0 -- Adding boost_program_options dependencies: headers -- Found boost_unit_test_framework 1.70.0 at /opt/boost/lib/cmake/boost_unit_test_framework-1.70.0 -- libboost_unit_test_framework.so.1.70.0 -- Adding boost_unit_test_framework dependencies: headers -- Found boost_serialization 1.70.0 at /opt/boost/lib/cmake/boost_serialization-1.70.0 -- libboost_serialization.so.1.70.0 -- Adding boost_serialization dependencies: headers -- Boost 1.49 found. -- Found Boost components: program_options;unit_test_framework;serialization
The bin subdirectory is empty
<denchmark-h:h4>Attachments</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3462584/mlpack3-cmake3-console.txt>mlpack3-cmake3-console.txt</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3462591/mlpack3-make-console.txt>mlpack3-make-console.txt</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3462594/CMakeError.log>CMakeError.log</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/files/3462595/CMakeOutput.log>CMakeOutput.log</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Fixed by removing the latest (1.70.0) version of boost and using 1.53.0 from the repo. sudo yum install boost-devel
